qas.question: In what year did Hyderabad become the capital of Nizams?
Whom did the Nizam ally with in the late 18th century?
Which military occupied Hyderabad city in a protection role?
What was the title of Baji Rao I?
What was the title of Hyder Ali?

context: In <a0_0>1769<a0_0/> Hyderabad city became the formal capital of the Nizams. In response to regular threats from Hyder Ali (<a4_0>Dalwai of Mysore<a4_0/>), Baji Rao I (<a3_0>Peshwa of the Maratha Empire<a3_0/>), and Basalath Jung (Asif Jah II's elder brother, who was supported by the Marquis de Bussy-Castelnau), the Nizam signed a subsidiary alliance with the <a1_0>East India Company<a1_0/> in 1798, allowing the <a2_0>British Indian Army<a2_0/> to occupy Bolarum (modern Secunderabad) to protect the state's borders, for which the Nizams paid an annual maintenance to the British.
